mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.wuzi_yuyue_uuid_number as wuziYuyueUuidNumber ,a.wuzi_id as wuziId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.wuzi_yuyue_text as wuziYuyueText ,a.wuzi_yuyue_yesno_types as wuziYuyueYesnoTypes ,a.wuzi_yuyue_yesno_text as wuziYuyueYesnoText ,a.wuzi_yuyue_shenhe_time as wuziYuyueShenheTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,wuzi.wuzi_name as wuziName ,wuzi.wuzi_uuid_number as wuziUuidNumber ,wuzi.wuzi_photo as wuziPhoto ,wuzi.wuzi_types as wuziTypes ,wuzi.wuzi_kucun_number as wuziKucunNumber ,wuzi.wuzi_content as wuziContent ,wuzi.wuzi_delete as wuziDelete ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM wuzi_yuyue a left JOIN wuzi wuzi ON a.wuzi_id = wuzi.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.wuzi_yuyue_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.wuziYuyueUuidNumber},'%')
and ( a.wuzi_id = #{params.wuziId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.wuzi_yuyue_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.wuziYuyueText},'%')
and a.wuzi_yuyue_yesno_types = #{params.wuziYuyueYesnoTypes}
and a.wuzi_yuyue_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.wuziYuyueYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.wuzi_yuyue_shenhe_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.wuziYuyueShenheTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.wuzi_yuyue_shenhe_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.wuziYuyueShenheTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.wuzi_id IS NOT NULL
and wuzi.wuzi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.wuziName},'%')
and wuzi.wuzi_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.wuziUuidNumber},'%')
and wuzi.wuzi_types = #{params.wuziTypes}
and wuzi.wuzi_kucun_number >= #{params.wuziKucunNumberStart}
and wuzi.wuzi_kucun_number <= #{params.wuziKucunNumberEnd}
and wuzi.wuzi_kucun_number = #{params.wuziKucunNumber}
and wuzi.wuzi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.wuziContent},'%')
and wuzi.wuzi_delete >= #{params.wuziDeleteStart}
and wuzi.wuzi_delete <= #{params.wuziDeleteEnd}
and wuzi.wuzi_delete = #{params.wuziDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(wuzi.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(wuzi.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
